law.catch_line: Court may compel production of a will.
law.text: Any District Court, on being informed that a person has in his custody the will of a testator, may summon him, and, by proper process, compel him to produce it.
law.history: Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 358, effective January 2, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4853.
